ch0100_00_kyohei/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Got any plans for today?
ch0100_00_kyohei/0101_0701_02_10:
We could go exploring or even have a Pokémon
battle! There’s so much I want to do!
ch0100_00_kyohei/7101_0701_01_10:
No breaks for me! I’m training every day to be my
best self!
ch0100_00_kyohei/7101_0701_02_10: No matter how much I train, I’m never satisfied!
ch0100_00_kyohei/7101_0701_03_10:
My goals are getting more and more challenging!
There’s tons of amazing people to look up to!
ch0100_00_kyohei/7102_0701_01_10: Pasio is such an exciting place!
ch0100_00_kyohei/7102_0701_02_10:
None of the people here knew much about
Pasio before they arrived...
ch0100_00_kyohei/7102_0701_03_10:
so experienced Trainers and newbies both have
the same starting point when exploring it!
ch0100_00_kyohei/7103_0701_01_10:
When I have the chance to take on a challenge, I
never hesitate! I go for it!
ch0100_00_kyohei/7103_0701_02_10:
I don’t want to miss out on an opportunity just
because I was worrying about it, you know?
ch0100_00_kyohei/7103_0701_03_10:
And if it doesn’t work out, you can always give up
later. But you have to jump in and try first!
ch0100_00_kyohei/7104_0701_01_10: Have you heard of Gear Station?
ch0100_00_kyohei/7104_0701_02_10: I want to battle the Subway Boss there with you!
ch0100_00_kyohei/7104_0701_03_10:
Once our adventure here in Pasio is done, let’s go
do that!
ch0100_00_kyohei/7105_0701_01_10:
If you’re ever feeling down in the dumps,
remember me!
ch0100_00_kyohei/7105_0701_02_10:
I’ll cheer you up and let you know that I’m proud
to be your friend!
ch0100_00_kyohei/7105_0701_03_10:
You should think of your friends when you’re
feeling down!
ch0100_00_kyohei/7105_0701_04_10:
Because your friends definitely know how
awesome you are!
ch0100_00_kyohei/1701_0701_01_10: Here’s a present for you! Go on! Just take it!
ch0100_00_kyohei/1701_0702_01_10:
Hey! Did that thing I gave you come in handy?
I’ll get you something good again!
ch0100_00_kyohei/2501_0701_01_10: I’m glad I came to Pasio all the way from Unova!
ch0100_00_kyohei/2501_0701_02_10: There’s a lot of strong Trainers here!
ch0100_00_kyohei/2501_0701_03_10: But I’m most glad that I met you!
ch0100_00_kyohei/2501_0701_04_10:
Now we’re friends, and that itself makes 
Pasio awesome!
ch0100_00_kyohei/2501_0702_01_10: I have to keep up with you as you get stronger!
ch0100_00_kyohei/2501_0702_02_10:
I won’t lose to you! It’s great to have a friendship
where you can say stuff like that!
ch0100_00_kyohei/2511_0701_01_10: I want to be even stronger!
ch0100_00_kyohei/2511_0701_02_10:
I’ll get stronger and have even more amazing
Pokémon battles with you!
ch0100_00_kyohei/2511_0701_03_10: The stronger we both are, the more fun it’ll be!
ch0100_00_kyohei/2511_0701_04_10:
We’ll both keep getting stronger, so I’ll always
have fun battling you!
ch0100_00_kyohei/2511_0702_01_10: It’s always a blast battling with you!
ch0100_00_kyohei/2511_0702_02_10:
Every day is exciting because you keep
getting stronger!
ch0100_00_kyohei/2511_0702_03_10:
I’ll have to keep up my training so I can keep you
on your toes, too!
ch0100_00_kyohei/3001_0701_01_10:
Hey, good morning! I just can’t make up my mind
on what to do today! Any ideas?
ch0100_00_kyohei/3003_0701_01_10:
I know taking naps is an indulgent way to spend
your time, but sometimes it’s just nice to kick back
with your Pokémon!
ch0100_00_kyohei/3005_0701_01_10:
If you’re wiped out at night, that just means you
had tons of fun during the day!
